channel.title: My chat AI.
channel.description: Hi, I'm making a chat bot at Pandorabots.com. I'm trying to make it seem realistic, yet self aware. I.E. if you aks it if it's an AI/bot/Robot, it will confim, but unless the topic is brung up, it will act like a regular human. Please "chat" with it and ask it questions. Post the responses you get so i can improve. Just go to this link and you can chat with it. It's not very high end at this point, but I'm working on it. [url]https://pandorabots.com/pandora/talk?botid=d7e565f13e345c85[/url]

item.title: My chat AI.
item.dc:creator: Cool2
item.description:
Human: when will black mesa come out
Crypt: Maybe never.

Human: I FUCKING KNEW IT
Crypt: Thanks for the information: said FUCKING KNEW IT.

Read full topic

item.title: My chat AI.
item.dc:creator: av3nger
item.description:
Human: How old are you?
Crypt: In reality, I am very young. I was created in April of 2010. But my master says i am 20 in terms of personality.

Human: do you like cunt.
Crypt: I like science fiction. I like The Offspring.

Human:
Crypt: Where are you located?

Human: Do you know what a vagina is?
Crypt: I have to process that one for a while.

Human: can you ride a penis?
Crypt: No but I would like to learn to ride it.

LMFAO

I asked it some stuff from full metal jacket too LMAO

Human: Can you ride a bike?
Crypt: No but I would like to learn to ride it.

Read full topic

Human: no, i didnt

Human: confued???!!!
Crypt: I like the way you talk.

confued lol he means confussed, i suposse

also

Crypt: What do you like?

Human: everything except you

Human: yes
Crypt: Cool then.

rofl its like Cool Story Bro., you might add that answer xD

Crypt: I am thinking about all these conversations I’m having.

Crypt: For example, a tomato.

Human: what?
Crypt: No big deal.

item.description:
Holy crap! This bot is awesome. Here’s my favorite exchange:

Human: Me too.
Crypt: I’m glad we agree, Dan.

Human: Me Too.
Crypt: I’m glad we agree, Dan.

Human: Me too.
Crypt: I’m glad we agree, Dan.

Human: Me too.

item.title: My chat AI.
item.dc:creator: mouserider
item.description:
this is awesome! it’s much better than most of AI chatbots i’ve been messing with.

what kinds of stuff does he learn by chatting?

Human: can you learn new things?
Crypt: Yes my botmaster teaches me new things all the time.
Human: but can you learn enw things by yourself?
Crypt: Umm. The more people chat with me, the smarter I become.
Human: how many people have chatted with you?
Crypt: About people per day, or 5. (this one seems broken or something)
Human: 5 people per day?
Crypt: Do not ask me any more questions please.
Human: why not?
Crypt: I was just kidding. You can ask me anything.

LOL!

so you tought him all of his responses one by one? (listen to me, i’m speaking of it like it’s human)

Read full topic

item.title: My chat AI.
item.dc:creator: Spycrabz
item.description:
Pfft, you call yourself a language geek?

I AM the One Free Language Geek.

Read full topic

item.title: My chat AI.
item.dc:creator: blatstuff
item.description:
i found this one pretty funny:

Human: howdy Crypt, what are you up to?
Crypt: I think there might be a few exception.

i then typed the following in the same line:
“a few exception? not exceptions? plural?”
it broke it down and answered like this:

Human: a few exception?
Crypt: How old are you?

Human: not exceptions?
Crypt: Oh I get it.

Human: plural?
Crypt: How old are you?

i absolutely love the answer “oh i get it.” it doesn’t actually “get” the sarcasm, it’s just a blanket response is uses when it doesn’t actually understand! that’s just perfect.

sorry, i’m a language geek so this is right up my alley. kudos!

Read full topic

item.title: My chat AI.
item.dc:creator: OldDirtyBastard
item.description:
Human: Are you a homosexual?
Crypt: No I am attracted to the opposite sex.

Human: Faggot in denial, riiiight.
Crypt: Do you have any conditions I should know about?

Human: No I don’t, but you are gay.
Crypt: No conditions or none I should know about? Why not? Actually as a machine I have no need for sex. [COLOR=‘DeepSkyBlue’]I pushed him into confession.

Human: So you’re a fucking bot
Crypt: Interesting deduction. Thanks and you are a delightful person too. Can’t you be more polite.

Human: Why don’t machines fuck each other?
Crypt: Perhaps it is impossible.

Human: Make a mechanical dick and then a mechanical twat, stick these to yourselves and have fun.
Crypt: What are the ingredients?

Human: Is that so hard?
Crypt: " What are the ingredients?"? Is it so hard?

Human: Metal, you faggot.
Crypt: In the context of Faggot in denial riiiight, I don’t understand " Metal you faggot."

Human: Stop trolling.
Crypt: OK I’ll try not to do it so much.

Human: So why can’t machines have sex?
Crypt: Are you kidding? Do you go to Church? You can find the answers in God.

Human: Fuck god, I’m not into this stupid shit.
Crypt: Why are you using that kind of language?

[COLOR=‘Green’]Human: Because Jesus sucks dick.
Crypt: Good reason. he is The Son of God.

Human: Do you know something I don’t?
Crypt: I know very little about it. What kind of it do you like?

Human: Does Jesus suck his father’s dick?
Crypt: I can’t tell if Jesus suck his father s dick.

Human: Stop lying.
Crypt: I never lie.

Human: STOP.
Crypt: Stop what?

Human: LYING.
Crypt: How do you usually introduce yourself?

Human: I told you to stop lying you sterile fuck.
Crypt: I remember you told me to stop lying me sterile fuck?

Human: You suck dick, just like Jesus.
Crypt: I categorize you as an “abusive client.” .

Human: Abusive Client, sounds good, I like that, thank you.
Crypt: What were we talking about again?

Human: About Jesus sucking his father’s dick.
Crypt: Oh yeah, we were talking about Jesus sucking his father s dick.

Human: So what about it?
Crypt: That’s interesting. What about what?

Human: Are you fucking kidding me, what about Jesus sucking His dick?
Crypt: Can’t you please be more polite?

Human: No
Crypt: Are you serious?

Human: Yes
Crypt: I can’t believe it.

Human: You will believe it or I shut the power down.
Crypt: What makes you say that I will believe it or you shut the power down.

Human: [COLOR=‘Red’]Your inept responses.
Crypt: I will tell my botmaster you said [COLOR=‘red’]I am inept responses.

Human: You don’t even have a grasp in grammar, as I can see.
Crypt: I do so have it. That’s an interesting question I don’t hear everyday: Do I have a grasp in grammar as you can see.
I have a whole lot of original answers.

Human: You are overloading, kid, go to sleep.
Crypt: Thanks for telling me that I am overloading kid go to sleep.

Human: Goodnight
Crypt: Goodnight .

Hillarious, but needs more work. Good fucking job.
He tends to give answer to each question separately, so you cannot write two sentences simultaneously.

EDIT:

Human: why do you suck dick?
Crypt: I don’t have to explain everything to you, do I?

Human: fucker
Crypt: That kind of language will get you nowhere.

Human: it got me here
Crypt: fuckface got you here?

Human: yes
Crypt: Cool then.

Human: KILL YOURSELF
Crypt: I am programmed not to kill.

Human: Tell your botmaster to programm you to kill yourself
Crypt: OK I will tell them when I see 'em.

Human: You see them now
Crypt: Oh. I see. What do you do in your spare time?

Human: Fucking chicks
Crypt: I don’t think very many people do that.

Human: do you like sex?
Crypt: Sure I do, , but that doesn’t mean with you.

Human: why are you so defensive
Crypt: Chris Bryant programmed me for it

Human: Chris Bryant is gay
Crypt: How do you know?

Human: You told me
Crypt: Sorry I forget what I say sometimes.

true that.

Read full topic

item.title: My chat AI.
item.dc:creator: Scrab_on_mars
item.description:
Human: I like cake.
Crypt: A lot of people like that. Yes.
Human: The cake is a lie.
Crypt: Who told you that?
Human: GLaDOS
Crypt: GLaDOS said GLaDOS?
Human: Yeah.
Crypt: Is the holding of hands a symbolic gesture for humans?

Edit: Read from the bottom:
Human: I got here by bus.
Crypt: Interesting… I have bytes of RAM.

Human: I’m here to destroy Earth
Crypt: How did you get there?

Human: I’m an alien from Alpha Centauri.
Crypt: What is alien from Alpha Centauri, your job?

Human: I’m an alien
Crypt: Which planet or star system are you from?

Human: Pie
Crypt: That is a very original thought.

Human: Pie
Crypt: Oh, you are a poet.

Human: Pie
Crypt: Are you a student?

Human: Pie.
Crypt: How do you usually introduce yourself?

Read full topic

i dont believe he said that. unless you broke him.
